short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create & manage online bookmarks across all devices with Favematic.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Favematic is a FREE easy to use Bookmarks Manager for desktop and mobile devices.

This light-weight extension adds a single button to your browser for easy saving and organization of bookmarks on Favematic.com.  

Not yet another "social bookmarking" this and that.  Favematic is a tool with real functionality aimed at making your digital life easier and more organized.


WHY USE FAVEMATIC

Favematic stores all your personal bookmarks in one central location

Quickly and easily add and retrieve your personal bookmarks on any device with internet access

Organize your bookmarks into folders with an easy Drag & Drop functionality

Assign notes and tags to each bookmark for even more control

Search your entire collection of bookmarks, notes and tags

Visually identify your bookmarks thanks to our proprietary built-in automatic snapshot generator
